description:
Brew up a love bath with this luxurious floral bath soak! Featuring a blend of different love enhancing flowers, allow this bath to transport you to higher planes made of loving energy. Then step out and allow yourself to embrace this new more confident and sensual version of yourself. You'll be glad you did!! <3


Each flower and all additional ingredients in this bath were specifically chosen for their unique connections to love. Once purchased you will receive a full ingredient list. If you have any allergy concerns please message me, and I will be more than happy to discuss what I use to figure out something that works for you!
